time.description: The time the signature was generated

expires.description: The number of seconds the signature remains valid after being generated

error_no.description: Error number if actuator is busy or throwing error

module_name.description: Identify the module to be managed by its class name

thread_response.description: Response from action applied: start | stop | restart | status

service_name.description: Identify the service to be managed

service_response.description: Response from action applied: start | stop | restart | status

host_id.description: Host ID of node. Required only for node hw actuator

alert_type.description: Sensor Response Type. Required only for node hw actuator

instance_id.description: Instance ID which will be map with Resource ID. Required only for node hw actuator

severity.description: The degree of impact an event has on the operation of a component. Required only for node hw actuator

site_id.description: A number that uniquely identifies a single data center site. Required only for node hw actuator

rack_id.description: A numerical value that identifies a single Rack in a single site. Required only for node hw actuator

node_id.description: A numerical value that indicates type of node in cluster. i.e 1-Mero,2-GW in EOS. Required only for node hw actuator

resource_type.description: Enclosure resource type like FRU, Sensor. Required only for node hw actuator

resource_id.description: FRU's Resource Id. Required only for node hw actuator

event_time.description: Time of fetch data from IPMI. Required only for node hw actuator

fetch_time.description: Time of fetch data from IPMI. Required only for node hw actuator

specific_info.description: Specific dynamically generated information of FRU's. Required only for node hw actuator
